message.text: Emits an aura of Attack and Magick power. Applies a temporary increase to nearby allies. Can be used with Field Shift. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration after leaving the aura. LV.6: Increases the size of the area of effect.</COL>

Emits an aura of Attack and Magick defense. Applies a temporary increase to nearby allies. Can be used with Field Shift. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration after leaving the aura. LV.6: Increases the size of the area of effect.</COL>
After charging, launch tracking projectiles. Fires magic spheres of Holy attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of magic spheres (3→5).</COL>

Generates magic spheres that revolve around oneself. The spheres will each nullify one attack. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect. LV.6: Increases number of magic spheres (3→5).</COL>

Creates a magic area that rapidly regenerates health. (Maximum healing limited to grey health)(Damages undead) <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect. LV.6: Increases the size of the area of effect.</COL>
Creates a magic area that instantly cures debilitations. (Damages undead) <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect. LV.6: Increases the size of the area of effect.</COL>
After charging, fire a magic sphere that emits an intense light of the Holy attribute in a wide area. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

Charge magic within your body. When your health is exhausted, create a large explosion dealing large damage to enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption of the effect. LV.6: Increases damage and range of the effect.</COL>
